item.title: CEX Platform Coins Experience General Increase, BGB Surges Over 15%, GT Surges Over 30%
item.description: On August 13th, based on market data, influenced by the FOMO sentiment triggered by the significant increase of OKB, the platform tokens of centralized cryptocurrency exchanges witnessed a general upward trend, including:OKX's platform token OKB surged by 200% and is now trading at $134.Bitget's platform token BGB surged by 15.5% and is now trading at $4.97.Gate's platform token GT surged by 31.1% and is now trading at $19.16.Binance's platform token rose by 2.5% and is now trading at $849.

item.title: Affected by FOMO sentiment, Hong Kong Stock NewFire Technology rose by 37.20%, while Gate Platform's coin GT surged over 30%.
item.description: On August 13th, based on market data, due to the FOMO sentiment possibly triggered by the significant surge of OKB, the Hong Kong-listed Neufund Technology rose by 37.20% and is now trading at 6.86 Hong Kong dollars. GateToken (GT), the native token of the Gate.io platform, surged by more than 30% and is currently priced at $19.6.

item.title: Ultra-Large Burn + X Layer Upgrade Bring Multiple Benefits, OKB Skyrockets 112% in Half an Hour
item.description: August 13th. Based on market data, OKB began to rise at 14:15 Beijing time today and maintained an accelerating trend. Eventually, it reached a high of $99.27 at 14:40 and then pulled back, seeing a 112% increase within just 25 minutes.In terms of news, OKX officially announced that they have made a strategic decision to upgrade X Layer, positioning it as a leading public chain focusing on DeFi, payments, and RWA scenarios. The network's throughput has been enhanced to 5000 TPS, Gas costs have been reduced to nearly zero, and security and Ethereum mainnet compatibility have been significantly improved. OKB will continue to serve as the exclusive Gas and native token of X Layer. Furthermore, 65.25 million OKB from historical buybacks and reserves will be burned at one time, fixing the total supply at 21 million OKB.

item.title: OKB Surges, Breaks Above $130 in Short Time, 1-Hour Gain Expands to 186%
item.description: August 13th. Based on market data, OKB saw a brief pullback and then continued to rise. It quickly surged and broke through $130. Currently, it is trading at $120, with a 1-hour price increase of 186%. (The rally began at 14:15.)

item.title: OKX: X Layer Completes PP Upgrade and Launches OKB Gas Token Economic Model Optimization
item.description: August 13th. According to official channels, OKX has made a strategic decision to upgrade X Layer. It is being transformed into a leading public chain that focuses on DeFi, payments, and RWA scenarios. X Layer is built on the Polygon CDK and completed the "PP Upgrade" on August 5, 2025. This upgrade has increased network throughput to 5000 TPS and reduced Gas costs to nearly zero, significantly enhancing security and Ethereum mainnet compatibility. Meanwhile, the upgrade is advancing ecosystem development in parallel. It focuses on DeFi, global payments, and RWA issuance and circulation. OKX is accelerating application implementation through ecosystem funds, liquidity incentives, and infrastructure enhancements. OKX Wallet, OKX Exchange, and OKX Pay have fully integrated with X Layer, providing 0 Gas fast withdrawals and efficient on-chain payment experiences.This upgrade also includes the optimization of the OKB Gas Token economic model. OKB remains the sole Gas and native token of

item.title: OKB Short-Term Drops Below $80, Retreating Over 20% from High
item.description: On August 13th, based on market data, OKB briefly fell below $80 and is now trading at $84, retracing more than 20% from its peak.

item.title: 1-Hour Surge Exceeds 110%, OKB Surges Above $90
item.description: August 13th. Based on market data, OKB has soared above $90 and reached a peak of $99.27. Currently, it is trading at $97.63, with a 112% increase in the past hour.

item.title: OKB Surges Above $65, Spikes 45% in 30 Minutes
item.description: On August 13th, based on market data, OKB has soared to above $65 and is currently priced at $67.9, experiencing a 45% increase within half an hour.

item.title: Affected by OKX's announcement of burning approximately 65.25 million OKB, OKB experienced a short-term surge of over 11%.
item.description: On August 13th, according to official channels, OKX is going to carry out a one-time burn of the historical buyback and the reserved 65,256,712.097 OKB. It will then switch to using a smart contract to automatically burn all the transferred OKB to a black hole address. Once this operation is completed, manual OKB burning will come to an end, and the total supply of OKB will be set at 21 million.Influenced by this news, OKB witnessed a significant surge of over 11% in the short term and was temporarily trading at $52.

item.title: Abraxas Capital's short position is currently at a unrealized loss of $2.4478 billion
item.description: On August 13th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, Abraxas Capital holds short positions for BTC, ETH, SOL, HYPE, and SUI in 2 addresses. Currently, it is facing a total floating loss of $2.4478 billion. The majority of the floating loss comes from ETH, amounting to over $1.887 billion.
